page.title: 16 NEWMARKET HOSPITAL STAFF
page.content: Some of the buildings that house the hospital in 1985 used to be the Newmarket Union Workhouse which, in the 1871 census had 216 occupants. These buildings are now grade 2 listed, which means they canÂ£t be altered or demolished unless special permission is granted. Now the hospital has 750 full and part-time staff. 350 of them are nurses of different status,and 50 are doctors. The other 350 staff are made up of a)Medical Staff-Pharmacists,Dietian, ECG Technians,EEG Technicians, Radiographers,Audiologists, Chiropodists,Occupational Therapists, Opthalmologists,Pathologists,Theatre Assistants and Physio Therapists. b)Administrative and Clerical staff- People are also
